revision.text: :The DI_TEXT* flags change the alignment of the string relative to the starting position: :*{{c|DI_TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT}} - Left alignment (default) :*{{c|DI_TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER}} - Center aligment :*{{c|DI_TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT}} - Right alignment<noinclude>[[Category:Include templates]]</noinclude>
